name: EYE-EARN
description: EYE-N, also referred to as EYE-EARN, which stands for earning income through your eyes. It's a cutting-edge web3 life application that seamlessly merges short videos with NFT and gives everyone a sustainable income in the world. As a comprehensive platform, whether catering to aficionados of short videos, content creators, NFT enthusiasts, or anyone else, EYE-N serves as a diverse, engaging, and invaluable companion in the life. EYE-N is committed to creating an inclusive, equitable, and transparent ecosystem that enables users to derive real value. By combining short video functionality with NFT technology, it not only allows users to watch, create, and share short videos, but also provides them with a more enriched and valuable experience, offering opportunities and incentives to engage in the web3 economy. With the advent of the AI era, many jobs face challenges of being replaced by AI, which will cause countless people to lose their stable income. EYE-N provides a reliable solution, helping those who have lost their jobs due to AI replacement to rediscover income sources, expanding economic opportunities, enabling everyone to have control over their income regardless of country or background. EYE-N's mission is to continuously provide a sustainable income for everyone in the world. We believe that sharing the value of data traffic with users and by connecting creators and audiences, creating and sharing, everyone can earn a real income in EYE-N. We are committed to upholding this mission to ensure that opportunities for sharing the data traffic persist and creating a more reliable income and future for people.
